thread.title: BRIEF-Diplomat Pharmacy Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.18

title: BRIEF-Diplomat Pharmacy Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.18
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Diplomat Pharmacy Inc:
* DIPLOMAT ANNOUNCES 4TH QUARTER AND 2017 YEAR END FINANCIAL RESULTS; PROVIDES 2018 GUIDANCE
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.18
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.09 * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.06 TO $0.17 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $5.3 BILLION TO $5.6 BILLION * SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EPS BETWEEN $0.87 AND $0.97 * ‍REVENUE FOR Q4 OF 2017 WAS $1,155 MILLION, COMPARED TO $1,145 MILLION IN Q4 OF 2016​
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.02, REVENUE VIEW $5.42 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.16, REVENUE VIEW $1.17 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
